attributes.action: Review elements of the Animal Welfare Regulations 2018 affecting pet boarding.
attributes.additional_details:
Legislation: https://www.legislation.gov.uk/uksi/2018/486/contents/made

Guidance: http://www.cfsg.org.uk/_layouts/15/start.aspx#/The%20Animal%20Welfare%20Licensing%20of%20Activities%20Involvi/Forms/AllItems.aspx

Example of impact: https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2018/12/31/home-dog-boarders-forced-business-barking-mad-regulations/

Example of impact: https://www.petbusinessworld.co.uk/news/feed/special-report--business-owners-fight-back-against--nonsensical--new-rules
attributes.background: On 1 October 2018, legislation came into force affecting boarding kennels, catteries, home boarding & daycare, amongst other related activities. Some of the new regulations are counterintuitive, harmful to welfare and increase the risk of attacks on those delivering care, risking jobs & businesses.
